name: @esouthard totally fair! I'd happily pay $79, or even $99. The only good ones I see are going for north of $250!

summary: @cleverdevil I have one of the "good" Thunderbolt 2 docks. It cost around $270 and it's not as good as I want it to be. There just aren't enough of these, little competition, high prices, middling features. This is why "remove all the ports" bothers me so much.
